titles.title: Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to modernize payments for ambulatory surgical centers under the medicare program.
Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the requirements and the formula for payments for services furnished to individuals in ambulatory surgical centers.
